original_text:
Scarcely are they planted, scarcely sown,
    scarcely has their stem taken root in the earth,
when he blows on them, and they wither,
    and the tempest carries them off like stubble.
korean_text: 그들은 겨우 심기고 겨우 뿌려졌으며 그 줄기가 겨우 땅에 뿌리를 박자 곧 하나님이 입김을 부시니 그들은 말라 회오리바람에 불려 가는 초개 같도다

sentences.original_text: scarcely has their stem taken root in the earth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 줄기가 겨우 땅에 뿌리를 내리면,

sentences.original_text: and the tempest carries them off like stubble.
